code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import userReducer from"./features/users";import rateReducer from"./features/rating";import{setUser,updateUser as _updateUser}from"./features/users";import rating,{addRating as _addRating,getRating as _getRating,updateRating as _updateRating}from"./features/rating";export var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{user:state.users,rate:state.rates};};export var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{updateUser:function updateUser(data){return dispatch(_updateUser(data));},getUser:function getUser(data){return dispatch(setUser(data));},getRating:function getRating(id){return dispatch(_getRating(id));},addRating:function addRating(data){return dispatch(_addRating(data));},updateRating:function updateRating(data){return dispatch(_updateRating(data));}};};export var Store=configureStore({reducer:{users:userReducer,rates:rateReducer},middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:false});}});
